about_the_game:
VIRTUAL RENOVATION EXPERIENCE
Home Restoration offers an immersive experience, featuring stunning graphics, realistic physics, and a soothing soundtrack that creates the perfect ambiance for an enjoyable gameplay session.

RENOVATE, REPAIR & CLEAN UP!
There are lots of houses waiting for you to renovate! Transform them from dilapidated ruins into stunning dream homes. Dive into the exciting world of renovation, fixing everything from broken pipes to damaged walls. Clean up rooms and sell unnecessary items for profit.

DECORATE LIKE AN INTERIOR DESIGNER
Personalize each room with a vast selection of furniture, decor, and color schemes, allowing you to create a unique atmosphere that will leave potential buyers in awe. Additionally, enhance the aesthetics of your home by arranging the garden and introducing fresh blooms for a more appealing appearance.

DISCOVER NEW CITIES
From London to New York, there is a selection of 6 distinct cities where you can purchase and renovate new houses. Unlock these cities, and earn more money!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: OpenXR. Oculus Quest 2. (HTC Vive not supported)
  • Additional Notes: VR ONLY!

short_description: Grab your tools, put your creative hat on, and get ready to restore, renovate, and create beautiful homes in Home Restoration. This game has been downloaded nearly 100 million times on mobile devices and now it’s available on VR! It’s time to bring old houses back to life and make dreams come true!
